bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for the Planning, Design, Installation, and Repair of Submarine Power Cable Systems
IEEE Guide for the Planning, Design, Installation, and Repair of Submarine Power Cable Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide provides a list of factors to consider when planning, designing, permitting, installing, commissioning, and repairing submarine power cable systems. While many factors are common to both power and communication cables, this guide focuses on power cables that cross seas, lakes, and rivers
This guide presents a list of factors to consider when planning, designing, installing, and repairing a submarine power cable.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
